manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
🆕 Added / Enabled  
- A new preview design for one-time view media in DMs.  
- New icon for the Explore tab.  
- Notes “Watching Now” feature enabled.  
- New reply composer for Notes enabled.  
- Just watched indicator enabled.  
- Original audio tab enabled in Notes audio browser.  

🔄 Updated / Restored  
- The plus button in Direct Composer is now working properly.  
- Message tab in camera has been brought back.  
- Account profile picture in Reels has been brought back.  
- Enhanced Clips tab lane fonts.  
- Updated HD toggle icon in Direct Gallery.  
- Updated old flags.  

🚫 Disabled  
- Prism fonts.  
- Interested / Not Interested button in Reels.  

🛠 Fixed  
- Fixed issues while opening notifications.  
- Fixed some minor issues.
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
